Introduction

RAINZ (RApturously INspiriting boyZ) was a seven-member project boy group managed by KISS Entertainment. Consisting of Produce 101 Season 2 contestants, they debuted on October 12, 2017, with their first mini-album Sunshine. They disbanded on October 28, 2018, following the end of their year-long contract.
